frontmatter.title: Good friction
frontmatter.description: Good friction makes for more memorable and unusual experiences. Digital processes work to eliminate all friction, including the good points.

frontmatter.title: Against Measure Y in San Mateo 2020
frontmatter.description: Measure Y is a proposal to restrict building in San Mateo by imposing strict limits for another 10 years. A vote against this measure will remove zoning restrictions that have restricted developers voters over the past 30 years.

frontmatter.title: Prioritize people
frontmatter.description: The pandemic has only exacerbated, not caused, these conditions. Use the tools available to connect with most meaningful people in a personal manner.

frontmatter.title: Ideas and connections
frontmatter.description: It's difficult to build in time for brainstorming and connecting with others. It's made harder when working alone, and the pandemic has exasperated the conditions.

frontmatter.title: Momentary perspective shifts
frontmatter.description: Everyone comes to a situation with a different mindset, and often different goals in mind. Seek other perspectives momentarily and realize there's more than one method.

frontmatter.title: Simplify paths
frontmatter.description: Simplify paths by eliminating distractions. Get rid of the extraneous, and make the next step clear. Paths are effective because they are a clear way through an otherwise difficult crossing.

frontmatter.title: Set the right targets
frontmatter.description: Hitting targets every time may be a sign of not setting big enough goals.  It's better to miss the right target than consistently hit easy targets.

frontmatter.title: Declutter diligence
frontmatter.description: It takes continued effort to focus on the right things. With continual calls for attention in other directions, it's easy to let those consume too much attention and time.

frontmatter.title: Push ideas out
frontmatter.description: Keep pushing out new ideas. Brainstorm on a single topic and create a list of ideas to get influenced creatively. Let the ideas spill over to other areas to keep moving forward.

frontmatter.title: Short term bursts
frontmatter.description: Sometimes it takes short term bursts to get mometum going, especially when the goal feels far away. Push through, find energy, keep going.
